title: Look for some suggestions - Fedra Serif A
content:
I am have designed an identity using Fedra Serif A.  
I am after some suggestions for complimentary sans type for stationery etc.

Was thinking Fedra Sans but then thought maybe someone would have some special suggestions.

 [‹ Books on Magazine Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007102637/http:/typophile.com/node/29777 "Go to previous forum topic") [Herb Lubalin, Mother & Child ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007102637/http:/typophile.com/node/29716 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mik

comments.content: What’s most important is the company and its audience. Tell us more.
